name: KeepGoing
description:
This is a game made by myself. This is also my first indie game.

 So give me more advice at https://forms.gle/NZaszdQSYVdxgWyU9. please.

 I spent 60 hours learning C# to code and make it. So I hope you like it.

 It's hard, I can't complete the level, too.

 My YouTube channel is https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqwEZYkFVmqXoJAbgGxw1HA?view_as=subscriber.
